snippet.title: Aurora: The Lost Medallion Alpha Demo Gameplay
snippet.description:
Aurora: The Lost Medallion is a 2D, hand-drawn, sci-fi, fantasy, point & click adventure game.
This is the Hide 'N' Seek scene Alpha Gameplay.

Find out more about Aurora: The Lost Medallion
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1088610/Aurora_The_Lost_Medallion__The_Cave
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AuroraTLMGame
